DOC.brief_summary: Osteoarthritis ( OA ) progressive , chronic disease affect 20 million Americans . There known cure OA management include pain control prevention functional decline . Purpose : To investigate immediate effect shock absorb insole ( SAI ) place shoe knee pain , functional mobility lower extremity biomechanics .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Shock Absorbing Insoles Knee Pain Walking Persons With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty adult ( age 50+ ) knee OA pain recruit . A physician diagnose severity knee OA radiograph . Participants test KBR Human Performance Lab campus Winston Salem State University ( WSSU ) . Participants complete demographic form survey knee pain function . Participants evaluate two condition : 1 ) SAI place inside shoe 2 ) shoe alone . There three walk task : 1 ) walk 25 foot usual pace ; 2 ) walk 25 foot fast pace ; 3 ) walk six minute distance ; 4 ) biomechanical gait analysis . After walk , participant rate amount knee pain experience . During biomechanical analysis , participant walk 20 foot walkway wear reflective marker . Eight camera force plate embed walkway measure amount body movement force apply leg joint walk .
